msbt.message: Why, , you MUST hear this. I happened upon a recipe for a Bunny Day crown! Yes, a Bunny Day crown! Now, don't be jealous. I know how much you'd love to have the recipe yourself. SoI made a copy for you! Dear me, I really am too kind, aren't I?
My goodness, it's all so exciting, no?Say, do you thinkthere might be more recipes out there?!I shall have my eyes peeled at all times. And you should be on the lookout too, .
Oh dear, your pockets are so very full. I can't possibly give you the recipe now. Not to worry. I'll hold on to it for you. Just get yourself organized and come see me again, .

I am simply over the moon right now! You see, I found a recipe for crafting a Bunny Day bag a moment ago. You really must have one too. I tell you, they are ALL the rage right now!Anyhoo, here you go. Your very own copy of the recipe. You mustn't go without, !
Now that you have a recipe, surely you'll collect some eggs and craft the bag, yes? I mean, who wouldn't want a brand- new bag, darling? Especially one so EGGStraordinarily stylish. Tee-hee!
My goodness! It looks as though you can't possibly carry another thing, darling. Nothing to be done but have you organize your things and come talk to me again later.
Oh! I'm so glad to have run into you. See, I happen to have a surplus of And I would be quite happy to offer you 5 of them for nothing in return! Simply as a gift, !
No need to thank me! Just think even more highly of me than you already do, darling.
Oh, you don't have room to carry these, do you? Well, I'll keep them safe for you.Do come back when you have room for this little gift, hm?
